mutations.name: Legendary Predator Elite
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into that of an apex predator with extraordinary hunting abilities
mutations.effectDescription: Dramatically increases speed and aggression, with enhanced targeting and pursuit capabilities

mutations.name: Legendary Hive Intelligence
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into a highly coordinated hive mind
mutations.effectDescription: Particles act with perfect coordination as if controlled by a single intelligence

mutations.name: Legendary Adaptive Genius
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior to rapidly adapt to any situation with extraordinary intelligence
mutations.effectDescription: Behavior patterns evolve in real-time to counter threats and exploit opportunities

mutations.name: Legendary Guardian Sentinel
mutations.description: Transforms the creature's behavior into that of a perfect guardian with extraordinary defensive capabilities
mutations.effectDescription: Particles form impenetrable defensive formations and counter-attack with perfect timing
